card.name: Ard Once Vain
card.text: Place on Adûnaphel the Ringwraith if in play as your Ringwraith; she becomes a War-lord. card.name: Arms of the Sea
card.text: Unique. Animal. Playable at Lighthouse at the Cape of Octopuses by a character with at least 7 prowess. May face up to 3 strikes of an attack. If controlling character is not an avatar your opponent makes a roll during your organization phase modified by -2; the controlling character is eliminated if the result is greater than his mind. tap: during CvCC to asign up to 3 strikes, for each strike, its prowess is reduced by -2. tap: during opponent’s turn if at an opponent’s site to discard a Great Ship just played on the company. Discard if his company moves to a site in a non-Costal Sea [c] region, unless to a Port or Port on River site (with a maximum of 2 non-Coastal Seas regions).

card.name: Ash-drake

card.name: Cult of the Dark Lord
card.text: Unique. Playable on Umbar if you have a unique faction in play at this site, and if you place a character present at the site in your out-of-play pile. Umbar becomes a Darkhaven [K] for your covert companies. All automatic-attacks become normal attacks against other players’ companies. tap: once per turn to search your discard pile for a Man or Dúnadan character or creature (without an asterix) and shuffle it into your play deck. Discard this card when Umbar leaves active play or if you do not have a unique faction in play at Umbar.

card.name: Drought
card.text: Environment. All factions in play at sites in a Desert [e] region are worth 1 less mp to a minimum of1. All attacks keyed to Desert [e] or keyed to sites in a Desert [e] receive +1 prowess. River cannot be played on a site in a Desert [e]. If either Sun or more than 1 copy of Drought is in play, all regions adjacent to a Desert [e] are also considered a Desert [e]. Discard Drought if the Reach of Ulmo is played.

card.name: Vaal Gark
card.text: Unique. Half-elf. Desert-screamer.

attr.value: Undead — 3 strikes with 10 prowess; cannot be canceled
Undead — 3 strikes with 10 prowess; cannot be canceled

card.name: Variag-king of Khand
card.text: Place on Ûvatha the Ringwraith if in play as your Ringwraith; he becomes a War-lord. You may play this card in lieu of a minor item in your starting company and start the game at Sturlurtsa; Ûvatha gains this site as a home site. Discard this card to take Horse-tamer from discard pile to hand.Cannot be duplicated.

card.name: Vaurak
card.text: Unique. Sand-Drake. 3 strikes. Attacker chooses defending characters. May be played keyed to Dune Sea, Far Harad, Gap of Khand, Harondor, Khand, Lurmsakun, Mirror of Fire, Near Harad, The Raj, and Harshandatt. If Doors of Night is in play, may also be played keyed to Bellazan, Felaya, Hyarmenfalas, Mardruak, Nurad and Nuriag.

attr.value: Spider. Scorpion — 1 strike with 6 prowess, attacker chooses defending characters. Characters may not tap to give +1 prowess to another character in their company against this attack. Any resulting body checks are modified by +2.

Spider. Scorpion — 1 strike with 6 prowess, attacker chooses defending characters. Characters may not tap to give +1 prowess to another character in their company against this attack. Any resulting body checks are modified by +2.

card.name: Wraiths of Nurn
card.text: Unique. Playable at Urlurtsu Nurn if the influence check is greater than 12. Standard Modifications: Ringwraith (+4), Shadow-Magic user (+2), Spirit-Magic user (+2). tap: untap your Ringwraith. Every time a creature or characters is eliminated by your Ringwraith bearing a Morgul-blade or The Fiery Blade place them under this faction instead of your mp pile (the creature or character still gives normal kill points). This faction yields an additional mp for every card placed under it. Discard this faction if opponent plays Banishment at Urlurtsu Nurn (as if the site had an Undead automatic-attack)

card.name: Zûrafy
card.text: Animal. Playable at any tapped or untapped non-Haven [GK] site in a Desert region [e] or adjacent to a Desert region [e]. If each character in a company controls a Zûrafy, the company may move up to 2 additional Desert [e] regions. tap to cancel a strike (not from an automatic-attack) against itself. tap in CvCC to tap all non-unique horse allies in opponent’s company.
